description: Jint wrapper implementation requires the service interface to be defined.
Sandbox constraints are applied to the base Jint wrapper service.
The performance benchmark test suite requires the core Jint service to be implemented.
mitigation_plan: Develop test suite against service interface mocks while core service is in development.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks go/no-go decision on performance NFRs.

description: Encryption logic is applied to the database entities defined for scripts.
The CRUD UI for scripts requires the backend CRUD API to be available.
mitigation_plan: Develop UI against a mocked API service until the backend is ready.
impact_if_delayed: Delays completion of the script management UI.

description: The frontend preview UI logic depends on the backend preview API.
mitigation_plan: Define API contract early and develop against a mock.

description: The design for immutability and retention is a core component of the audit logger service.
mitigation_plan: Engage security architect for design review before implementation.
